name: Roccin: da sussy wussy baka dude who stole my spaghetti with my life savings in it
name_original: Roccin: da sussy wussy baka dude who stole my spaghetti with my life savings in it
description:
Note: THIS GAME IS A JOKE, DON'T TAKE IT SERIOUSLY

Story (epic)

A long time ago, there was the rock who ate spaghetti. But, one day, a sussy wussy baka dude stole spaghetti. But they weren't ordinary spaghetti, they were spaghetti with life's earnings inside.
The rock got pissed off and went on an epic adventure with morbius, t poses, things and other things.

The game is in beta, so you might find some bugs and other stuff.
